ee pilibandawa merata widwathun dedenek pala karana adahas mese palakaramu.yukrenaye krimiyawe pihiti tharaka bhauthika nirikshanagaraye tharaka widyagnya genadi borisow pasugiya dinawala soya gaththe pruthiwiye sawoma bhithiyata pathwana soya ganimaki.ee mitar 400 ka palalak athi astaroyidayak 2032 agosthu 26 wanida pruthiwiyata wati pruthiwiyata loku balapamak ella karanu labana bawatayi.kese wuwath me pilibandawa lowa prabala ratawal 21 k pasugiya dinawala prabala awadanamak se salaka soya baliya.ee anuwa nasa aayathanaye widyagnyayan prakasha kara sitinne yukreniyanu tharaka widyagnyayan pawasana grahakaya pruthiwiye wadimata athi idakada itha awama bawayi.ee prathishathaya 65000 : 1 k lesa lowa pradhana pele tharaka widyagnyayo penwa dethi.

mili 100.7 kin enam 14.6% ka wardhanayak wartha kirima behewin hethu wuye aarthika kriyakarakam wala ha bankuwe naya dime kriyawaliya thula athpath karagath wegawath wardhanayayi. 2011 palamu karthuwa thula ru. mili. 78.6 k wu eheth 2012 palamu karthuwa thula 85.6% ka hinawana wardhanayak pennum karamin ru. mili. 11.3 ka agayak wartha kala wenath aadayam thula athulath ekama aadayam prabhawaya wanne pragdhana labha pamani. 2011 warshaye palamu karthuwa thuladi ru. mili. 1,838 k washayen pawathi bankuwe meheyum wiyadam 2012 warshaye palamu karthuwa thuladi ru. mili. 2132 dakwa wadiwiya.

anith ekatama ganakwath na hamoma duwaddi man nawathila monawahari deyak karanna hadapu nisane math balu kuduwe lagge ayi parakku ?dannam hithata podi dukakwageth danuna ra 1.00 withara yaluwekge ayiya kenek awa chis kali dekakuyi bima bothalayakuyi bonna kiyala dunna ekath kala hithe amaruwen inna man madurowan genuth karadare eeka athulen ena wasikili ganda apita kalin hithapu unge kela,thuwala plaster, hama jarawakma eeka athule .amaruwen iddi eka yaluwek awa awilla kiyala giya dan monawath karanna ba heta ude eliyata danawa ethakan inna anith ekage weri bahinakan kohewath hitapu ekek nisa math bebadu mak eka gaha gaththa.heta ude wadata yannath oone wadata nogiyoth ethanath prashna gedarata aranchiwunoth thawath prashna game yaluwon danagaththoth windinna wena aapahasa.eeda ra eliwenna parakku una wage danuna.jiwithe adurama dawasak kohoma hari gewuna tikak ninda giya parana yaluwo tikadenek aawa balanna eyalage mune hari dukbara widiyata malawila thibuna.mata unu akarathabiya nisada danne na .
